workflow_info.name: Pixar Style Img2Img with Flux
workflow_info.description: Use this workflow with Flux.1-dev for Pixar-style image generation with reference images
instructions: 2. Make sure flux1-dev.safetensors is in your models/checkpoints folder
3. The Python script will automatically populate the nodes
4. This is a reference - the script generates workflows programmatically

LoadImage.purpose: Loads the reference image for img2img

PositivePrompt.purpose: Main prompt with Pixar style prefix

inputs.text: pixar animation style, {your_prompt}, high quality, detailed, professional animation

NegativePrompt.purpose: Negative prompt to avoid bad results

inputs.text: low quality, blurry, distorted, ugly, bad anatomy, watermark, text

VAEEncode.purpose: Encodes reference image to latent space

KSampler.notes: denoise=0.75 means 75% new generation, 25% reference image influence

denoise_values.0.5-0.6: Very close to reference, minimal changes

sd_xl_base_1.0.safetensors.notes: Add Pixar LoRA for best results
